column4: Hi all, just installed ubuntu 9 on my laptop for the first time, loving it so far! Thought I'd drop in and lurk for a bit.
I'm amazed at how easy it is to use, can't wait to learn more about the details now. And I thought DOS 6.6 was cool when it came out ;-) Yes, I'm OLD.
oooo, xendon, good idea, will bring back memories
... i allways celebrate my self while playind hexen or doom on dosbox ..... thats real games
